title: A COSMOS Conversation with Ann Druyan
description:
Go behind the scenes of the Emmy速 Award-winning science show COSMOS: A Spacetime Odyssey when Neil deGrasse Tyson interviews its creator, writer and executive producer Ann Druyan.
Read more and listen to the full podcast at http://www.startalkradio.net/show/a-cosmos-conversation-with-ann-druyan/
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
